forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early transitioning to showers of rain and snow later at night. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers later at night. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 27F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. High 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers later in the day. High 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with a mix of rain and snow later in the day. High 39F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered flurries and snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
